Still bad and I'm not saying its cuz it aint, but at least the Gameplay is semi fun. And you can laugh at how terrible it is.

DMC 2 just seemed pretty Boring and the gameplay was totally nothing like a Devil May Cry game should be.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545326996368725c68e70200#post_545326996368725c68e70200

to round it up there is basically like 6 outcomes-

the normal "we are both in love" 

!http://cdn.mspaintadventures.com/storyfiles/hs2/02394_1.gif!

the rivalry "we hate each other so much we just cant get enough of it"

!http://cdn.mspaintadventures.com/storyfiles/hs2/02395_1.gif!

the love-hate relationship, where the couple would either love-hate, hate-love, love-love or hate-hate

!http://cdn.mspaintadventures.com/storyfiles/hs2/02398.gif!

this one

!http://cdn.mspaintadventures.com/storyfiles/hs2/02399.gif!

where 1 troll stabilizes the relationship to make it work

the platonic one where 1 calmed troll is there to make the hotheaded troll not fuck shit up every 5 minutes

!http://cdn.mspaintadventures.com/storyfiles/hs2/02400.gif!

and the one where they were truly made for each other

!http://cdn.mspaintadventures.com/storyfiles/hs2/02401.gif!
